// Parameters:

//   float4 BloomTintAndScreenBlendThreshold;

//   sampler2D ColorGradingLUT;
//   sampler2D DNEHexDofTexture1;

//   sampler2D DNEImageGrainTexture;

//   float4 DNEVignetMaskFactors;
//   sampler2D DNEVignetTexture;
//   float DistanceFade;
//   sampler2D FilterColor1Texture;
//   float4 HalfResMaskRect;
//   float4 ImageAdjustments1;
//   float4 ImageAdjustments2;
//   float4 LightShaftParameters;
//   sampler2D LightShaftsTexture;
//   float4 MinMaxBlurClamp;
//   sampler2D SceneColorTexture;
//   float2 TextureSpaceBlurOrigin;
//
//
// Registers:
//
//   Name                             Reg   Size
//   -------------------------------- ----- ----
//   MinMaxBlurClamp                  c0       1
//   BloomTintAndScreenBlendThreshold c7       1
//   ImageAdjustments1                c8       1
//   ImageAdjustments2                c9       1
//   HalfResMaskRect                  c10      1
//   LightShaftParameters             c11      1
//   AspectRatioAndInvAspectRatio     c12      1
//   TextureSpaceBlurOrigin           c13      1
//   DistanceFade                     c14      1
//   BloomScreenBlendThreshold        c15      1
//   BloomTintAndThreshold            c16      1
//   DNEImageGrainParameter           c17      1
//   DNEVignetColor                   c18      1
//   DNEVignetMaskFactors             c19      1
//   SceneColorTexture                s0       1
//   FilterColor1Texture              s1       1
//   LightShaftsTexture               s2       1
//   DNEImageGrainTexture             s3       1
//   DNEVignetTexture                 s4       1
//   DNEHexDofTexture1                s5       1
//   ColorGradingLUT                  s6       1
//

    ps_3_0
    def c1, 1, 0, -0.0500000007, 3
    def c2, 5, 4, 0.5, 1.5
    def c3, 0.300000012, 0.589999974, 0.109999999, 15
    def c4, 14.9998999, 0.05859375, 0.234375, 0.0625
    def c5, 0.001953125, 0.0078125, 0.064453125, 0
    def c6, 2, -1, 0, 0
    dcl_texcoord v0.zw
    dcl_texcoord1 v1
    dcl_texcoord2 v2.zw
    dcl_2d s0
    dcl_2d s1
    dcl_2d s2
    dcl_2d s3
    dcl_2d s4
    dcl_2d s5
    dcl_2d s6

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s13


// Unreal light shaft fix inserted with DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i -f --git --auto-fix-unreal-light-shafts --only-autofixed CRC32_F1458AA0_0.txt
texldl r6, c220.z, s13
mov r5, c13 // TextureSpaceBlurOrigin
mad r5.x, r6.x, c220.w, r5.x // Adjust each eye by 1/2 separation

    max r0.xy, v1.zwzw, c10
    min r1.xy, c10.zwzw, r0
    texld r0, r1, s5
    add r0.w, r0.w, c1.z
    mul r0.w, r0.w, c1.w
    mov r1, c2
    mul r1.x, r1.x, c0.x
    min r2.x, r1.x, c1.x
    mul_sat r0.w, r0.w, r2.x
    mul r2, c1.xxyy, v1.xyxx
    texldl_pp r2, r2, s0
    lrp_pp r3, r0.w, r0.zzxy, r2.zzxy
    dp3_pp r0.x, r3.zwyw, c3
    mul_pp r0.x, r0.x, -c1.w
    exp_pp r0.x, r0.x
    mul_sat_pp r0.y, r0.x, c7.w
    mul_sat_pp r0.x, r0.x, c15.x
    texld r2, v0.zwzw, s1
    mul r2, r2.zzxy, c7.zzxy
    mul_pp r2, r2, c2.y
    mad_pp r2, r2, r0.y, r3
    mov r0.zw, c12
    mad r0.yz, v0.xzww, -r0.xzww, r5.xxyw
    dp2add r0.y, r0.yzzw, r0.yzzw, c1.y
    rsq r0.y, r0.y
    rcp r0.y, r0.y
    mul_sat r0.y, r0.y, c2.z
    mad r0.z, c11.w, -r1.z, r1.w
    texld_pp r3, v0.zwzw, s2
    mul_pp r0.w, r3.w, r3.w
    mul_pp r3, r3.zzxy, c16.zzxy
    mul r3, r0.x, r3
    lrp r1.x, r0.w, r0.z, c11.w
    lrp r4.x, r0.y, c1.x, r1.x
    mul r0.x, c14.x, c14.x
    mul r0.x, r0.x, c14.x
    lrp_pp r1.x, r0.x, c1.x, r4.x
    mul_pp r0, r2, r1.x
    mad_pp r0, r3, c2.y, r0
    mad_pp r1.xzw, r0.zywy, c9.y, c9.x
    rcp r2.z, r1.x
    rcp r2.w, r1.z
    rcp r2.xy, r1.w
    mul_sat_pp r0, r0, r2
    mul r2.xyw, r0.xwzz, c4.xzzy
    frc r0.x, r2.x
    add r0.x, -r0.x, r2.x
    mad r2.x, r0.x, c4.w, r2.w
    mad r0.x, r0.y, c3.w, -r0.x
    add r2, r2.xyxy, c5.xyzy
    texld_pp r3, r2, s6
    texld_pp r2, r2.zwzw, s6
    lrp_pp r4, r0.x, r2, r3
    texld r0, v2.zwzw, s4
    dp4_sat r0.x, r0, c19
    mov r1.x, c1.x
    add r0.yzw, -r1.x, c18.xxyz
    mad r0.xyz, r0.x, r0.yzww, c1.x
    mad_pp r1.xy, v2.zwzw, r1.y, c17
    texld_pp r1, r1, s3
    mad r0.w, r1.x, c6.x, c6.y
    mul r0.w, r0.w, c8.w
    mad_sat_pp oC0.xyz, r4, r0, r0.w
    mov_pp oC0.w, r4.w

// approximately 66 instruction slots used (9 texture, 57 arithmetic)
